dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I decided to press the issue and Lucciâ€™s eyes got a bit more awkward.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci-Chan, come on be honest with me...

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: It is because my father wanted this of me...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci let out a sigh and then her eyes awkwardly met mine before darting towards her feet.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: M-my father is the King of Hell, but due to his past transgressions is trapped down there...the only way for him to leave his world of imprisonment is by having one of his daughters give birth to his son which will eventually free him by combing this realm and the underworld...

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: So the whole reason you are pushing for this so heavily...

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: It is so I can free my dad...and well there are other reasons too...
